data.oai_dc:dc: Individual calling measurements (long format). Duration is calling effort measurement, and the time of measurement is given in time (weeks), msmt.age (days), and age.std (mean-centred and scaled days). Term denotes whether it was the final measurement taken before death, PostEclosion is number of days the individual survived after eclosion (PE.std is mean-centred and scaled)
Sex differences|Life history evolution|Age-dependent reproductive effort|Resource acquisition|Sexual selection|Reproductive senescence
